title: Character Schema
description: Schema for defining characters within The Shadow Team Chronicles narrative universe, capturing their attributes, relationships, development arcs, and narrative significance.

object_type.description: Fixed value indicating this is a character object. This constrains the general object_type property from the base schema.

status.description: The character's current living state as of the latest point in the narrative timeline. This status may change throughout the story as events unfold.

role.description: The character's primary narrative function within the story structure, determining how they interact with main plot elements and other characters.
